goal.ch: 本課程主要教授進階電磁理論，作為學生進行相關研究所需之理論基礎。
goal.en: This course mainly teaches advanced electromagnetic theory as a theoretical basis for students to conduct related research.

outline.ch:
1. 靜電學
2. 邊界值問題
3. 介電質
4. 靜磁學
5. 馬克斯威爾方程式
outline.en:
1. Electrostatics
2. Boundary valued problems
3. Dielectrics
3. Magnetostatics
4. Maxwell's Equations

textbook.ch:
1. J. D. Jackson, Classical Electrodynamics (3rd Ed.), John Wiley & Sons, 1999.
2. G. L. Pollack and D. R. Stump, Electromagnetism, Addison Wesley, 2002.
3. G. B. Arfken and H. J. Weber, Mathematics Methods for Physicists (7th Ed.), Academic Press, 2011.
textbook.en:
1. J. D. Jackson, Classical Electrodynamics (3rd Ed.), John Wiley & Sons, 1999.
2. G. L. Pollack and D. R. Stump, Electromagnetism, Addison Wesley, 2002.
3. G. B. Arfken and H. J. Weber, Mathematics Methods for Physicists (7th Ed.), Academic Press, 2011.

gradMethod.ch: 課本研讀與練習 10%,  期中考 40%, 期末考 50%
gradMethod.en: Book study and assignment 10%, mid-term exam 40%, and final exam 50%

en.competencies: Advanced knowledge in the research subfield
